name: Escape the Temple (kitifulnines)
description:
Escape the Temple is a challenging platformer where the goal is to, well, escape the temple!

You and your boss uncovered an ancient artifact on an archaeology trip, but OH NO! It was a trap! Your boss, knowing he won't be able to make it, hands the artifact to YOU, and orders you to escape while you still can!

Simple enough, right? WRONG. The temple is slowly filling up with lava, so you gotta keep moving while also avoiding obstacles if you don't wanna become toast! Made with Construct 3 for VimJam2.

PLEASE NOTE THIS GAME IT MEANT TO BE VERY CHALLENGING!!!!

ESTIMATED RUNTIME

This game holds only 3 levels! But don't let the small number fool you. This game is REALLY difficult. I suspect that for experienced players, it'll take 2 minutes max. Average players might take about 5 minutes, while those with low experience... I would suggest maybe not playing altogether???? unless you like difficult games???? I might've gone a bit overboard with the difficulty, so I'm very sorry about that.

CONTROLS

THIS GAME ONLY WORKS WITH A KEYBOARD.

To move the character, you can press the A/D or Left/Right buttons! To jump, you can press W, Up, or Space!

At the end of each level, there is a lever. To pull it, press E.

If you're somehow stuck, you can restart the level by pressing R!

CREDITS

Programming, Art, SoundFX: kitifulnines

Music: Purchased from WOW Sound

Color Palette: Mega Drive Blue by MetaruPX
